comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Her father-in-law, Frank Conlon Havens, was a big landowner in the San Francisco Bay area. Seyd and Paul Havens were Frank Conlon Havens' twin sons. Their wives both died in the 1918 Spanish flu epidemic within a day of each other: www.oaklandgenealogy.com/transcriptions/SI25Octb.html This woman is apparently the former Grace Little of Philadelphia.

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: An elementary school in Piedmont, CA is named the Frank C. Havens Elementary School.
